message: Let's split it evenly to start, no need to overcomplicate things!
You got a good start, but I think I deserve a bit more for being the one who will do all the thinking
I'll give you a slightly better offer, but I'm not going to give you the whole pie
You're getting greedy, I'll give you a slightly better offer, but don't think you're getting away with the majority
I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not going to give up my advantage without a fight
I'm not going to let you take the whole pie, I'm making a stronger move now

You're getting desperate, I'm making a bold move to take control of the negotiations
I'm not going down without a fight, I'll make a last-ditch effort to get a fair share
You're running out of options, I'm taking a strong stance to get what I want
